content.webTitle: This week’s corrections | For the record

fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: Jo, not Joe, Grimond, led the Liberal party from 1956 to 1967 (“A very English scandal, a timeless portrayal of the human heart”, Comment, 3 June, page 47). Olympian Steve Parry, not Steve Barry (“We need to talk about the big C”, New Review, last week, page 12). A remark generally supportive of the burqa ban in Denmark was misattributed to Jens Kramer; it was made by Hanna Madsen when they were interviewed together (“ ‘Illiberal and crazy’: Denmark takes a right turn on immigration”, World, last week, page 28). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
